Function Documentation

int main (  void   ) 
 

Main function for the Simple example.

Creates an instance of the interface class Simple. Then creates an instance of the server class MACSimServer, passing it the interface. Calls the MACSimServer::run() member function which does not return until a key is pressed. The program then terminates.
